name: Shlink URL Shortener
longDescription:
CLICKING INSTALL WILL BREAK YOUR COSMOS-SERVER'S CONNECTION TO THE COSMOS MONGO SERVER. BACKUP YOU CONFIG FIRST! Shlink is a simple yet powerful self-hosted URL shortener that enables you to keep control over all your shortened URLs, by serving them under your own domains.

This Cosmos Compose file configures a stack of the Shlink URL Shortener app/server and a MariaDB database. You can also select if you want to self-host Shlink's Web Client in this stack, or if you only want to use the web client which Shlink host themselves.
description: Shlink is a URL shortener with an optionally self-host Web UI.
